item.description:
CRITERIA: Steppers 1 - 2 year plus


This workshop is for the more experienced group who participated in Sarah's last visit, are grounded in their basics and concepts and are ready to move on.
The pace will be a little faster, but your dance will be slower
Sarah and MeMe will assess everyone's skill level and give you new moves to master and fine tune.

The trick is to master at least one move, use the tools they give you , share it with your group in practice and grow together


The fee for this workshop is $30 per person


** 2 for 1 special at $50 = Any 1 workshop and Friday Line Dance/Walking class (The Sunday class has Sold Out).
See Lady Val to make your cash or check purchase to reserve your place in the workshops and classes. Or purchase this workshop via PayPal using your credit card. Or mail a check (payable to Steppers of Boston) to
Steppers of Boston
42 Wheeler Circle #41
Stoughton, MA 02072

Choice of:

Friday April 9th - Line Dancing Class - 8pm - 10pm at Max's Blues Cafe

or

Sunday April 11th - Footwork Class open to All - 10am - 12 at Verve


Parking Validation 2 hours Free

Pay Pal accepted. Please note: There will be a $2 surcharge added for credit card transactions

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Steppin 102 with Sarah Teagle and MeMe 11 a.m. to 1p.m.
